title: GOP Begins Ballot Watching Push Ahead of Election Day
description: Tedium and suspicion mix as skeptical observers monitor the largely monotonous work at a sprawling elections office near Las Vegas.
dc:creator: Danny Hakim and Alexandra Berzon
media:credit: Bridget Bennett for The New York Times
media:description: Workers separating ballots at the Clark County Election Department in North Las Vegas, Nev., on Friday.
